thread.title: Free book - My Own Story by Emmeline Pankhurst
thread.title_full: Free book - My Own Story by Emmeline Pankhurst - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Free book - My Own Story by Emmeline Pankhurst
text: To celebrate the forthcoming UK release of acclaimed new film Suffragette, the Telegraph has teamed up with Pathe to offer readers a free copy of My Own Story by Emmeline Pankhurst, published by Vintage, the leader of the Suffragette movement. Starring Carey Mulligan, Helena Bonham Carter, Brendan Gleeson, Anne-Marie Duff, Ben Whishaw and Meryl Streep as Emmeline Pankhurst, Suffragette tells the inspiring story of the real foot soldiers of the Suffragette movement. This is a film told by women, about women, that everyone should see. Suffragette is in cinemas from Monday, October 12, 2015. Click here to view the official Suffragette trailer. To find your nearest participating Tesco Express store, click here How to claim See the newspaper on Sunday, October 11, 2015 for details on how to claim your free copy of My Own Story by Emmeline Pankhurst. telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegraph
